name: كتابة - Premium Writing Practice
description: Experience a modern, elegant, and premium interface for practicing Hijaiyah, Latin, and Cursive writing. Master Quranic verses (Juz 28, 29, & 30) and refine your handwriting in a focused environment with fresh, beautiful icons. Supports Indonesian, English, and Arabic.
